description: This table contains a snapshot of information about an individual outreach or response within an Additional Information Request record.

columns.name: INFO_REQ_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the Additional Information Request record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: INFO_REQUEST_TX_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The Transmission Type of this Additional Information Contact.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Request


Response

columns.name: INFO_REQ_TX_DIRECTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The Transmission Direction of this Additional Information Contact.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Incoming


Outgoing

columns.name: INFO_REQ_CNCT_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description:
The Entry Source of this Additional Information Contact.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Referral Entry


ANSI X12 275

columns.name: CNCT_CREATE_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The UTC instant this Additional Information Contact was created.

columns.name: CNCT_CREATE_DTTM
columns.description: The instant this Additional Information Contact was created.

columns.name: CNCT_CREATE_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who created this Additional Information Contact.

columns.name: INFO_REQUEST_TX_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The Transmission Status of this Additional Information Contact.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Waiting To File


Waiting to Generate


Filed


Generated


Errored


Canceled

columns.name: GENERATED_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The UTC instant when a notification was generated for this Additional Information Contact.

columns.name: GENERATED_DTTM
columns.description: The instant when a notification was generated for this Additional Information Contact.

columns.name: FILED_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The UTC instant when this Additional Information Contact was filed.

columns.name: FILED_DTTM
columns.description: The instant when this Additional Information Contact was filed.

columns.name: COMM_ID
columns.description: The communication record which documents the communication involved in this Additional Information Contact.

columns.name: INSTANT_OF_ENTRY_DTTM
columns.description: The UTC instant when this Additional Information Contact was entered.

columns.name: INSTANT_OF_ENTRY_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant when this Additional Information Contact was entered.
